name: Live Fire Simulations
description: Realistic combat drills using live ammunition to enhance combat readiness.

cards.title: Timed Cover and Engage
cards.description: Shooting drill designed to maximize accuracy and cover usage under time constraints.
cards.bulletpoints: Engage multiple targets, seek cover effectively, fire under pressure
cards.summaryText: Run precision live fire by weaving between cover, clearing targets against the clock, and keeping rounds on point under duress.

cards.title: Dynamic Room Clearing
cards.description: Engaging threats in close quarters while maintaining a low profile.
cards.bulletpoints: Control angles of approach, maintain sight alignment, avoid crossfire
cards.summaryText: Clear rooms dynamically by slicing angles, staying low-profile, and coordinating fire to eliminate threats without crossfire.
